children.text: UUI is the core UI framework powering

digital ecosystem since 2016, driving more than 50 mission-critical internal applications. As an open-source solution, it also serves as an accelerator for EPAM customers, delivering engineering excellence, continuous innovation, and long-term support. UUI’s evolution is inseparable from EPAM’s own growth — as long as EPAM continues to advance, UUI will remain actively developed, maintained and future-proofed.

The dedicated team behind UUI ensures rapid resolution of major bugs, ongoing improvements, and continuous enhancement of documentation. If you think you've found a bug, or you have a new feature idea — do not hesitate to open an issue in our
for how-to questions. You may get an answer from UUI Team as well as from community experts. Also, you may request our personalized support with a 48-hour SLA for the first answer through
If you need some help with custom features EPAM and our team can provide services on top of UUI. You may
or reach out to us directly via Teams (EPAM only).
